duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide chair side assistance to a licensed dentist.
Exposure and development of dental intra-oral and extra-oral radiographs.
Dispensing, procuring, and mixing dental materials, and maintaining supply inventory.
Recording vital signs such as temperature, pulse, respiration, and blood pressure.
Gathering and recording information from patients concerning past and present medical and dental history.
Charting the mouth, flossing the teeth, and making preliminary inspections of the mouth and teeth.
Giving intra-oral instructions and demonstrations of oral hygiene procedures.
Receiving removable prostheses for cleaning or repair work.
Removing cement from dental restorations and appliances with hand instruments only, limited to the clinical crown.
Making dental plaque smears, preliminary study model impressions, and opposing model impressions.
Placing or removing pre-formed crowns or bands for determining size only when assigned by the dentist and under his supervision only.
